title: FS: T206Christy Mathewson White Cap SGC6 80
author: wilkiebaby11

posts.post_title: FS: T206Christy Mathewson White Cap SGC6 80
posts.post_content:
Sold pending payment.... $3700 PPgoods or $3500 FF/MO/cash
An absolute stunner of a card.  This card exhibits NM qualities in almost all facets.  Very minor wear to a corner kept this from a higer NM assessment.  For those who only collect PSA, this one seems like a no-brainer for a crossover. 

[IMG]https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/1099/3990/products/matty_1024x1024.jpg?v=1530902290[/IMG]
